DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Approach Type Changed Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response as to whether the procedure used during surgery was modified.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._a way of entering or leaving._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
